trans-unit.source: Build Reliable and Elastic Cloud Apps with Messaging
trans-unit.target: Build Reliable and Elastic Cloud Apps with Messaging

trans-unit.source: Learn how to build reliable and elastic cloud applications with messaging in Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to build reliable and elastic cloud applications with messaging in Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Build reliable and elastic cloud apps with messaging
trans-unit.target: Build reliable and elastic cloud apps with messaging

trans-unit.source: Dynamic demand is a reality for today's applications.
trans-unit.target: Dynamic demand is a reality for today's applications.

trans-unit.source: From seasonal and variable demand to unexpected social media trends, modern applications must deal gracefully with spikes in load that can be both uncertain or expected.
trans-unit.target: From seasonal and variable demand to unexpected social media trends, modern applications must deal gracefully with spikes in load that can be both uncertain or expected.

trans-unit.source: The Platform as a Service (PaaS) nature of Azure Service Bus enables you to create applications that scale easily and that can recover from spikes or momentary outages of components.
trans-unit.target: The Platform as a Service (PaaS) nature of Azure Service Bus enables you to create applications that scale easily and that can recover from spikes or momentary outages of components.
